title: What are the top 10 colleges in Dhaka? - Quora

response.answer_text: Top 10 Colleges in Dhaka: 1. Notre Dame College 2. Adamjee Cantonment College 3. Viqarunnisa Noun Girls School and College 4. Dhaka City College 5. Rajuk Uttara Model College 6.
